amendment.description: To prevent retaliation against a member of the Armed Forces for providing testimony about the military value of a military installation.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1491 withdrawn in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

Amendment SA 1491 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Thune. (consideration: CR S8773; text: CR S8773) To prevent retaliation against a member of the Armed Forces for providing testimony about the military value of a military installation.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1491 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Thune.
